Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS LAYING IN BED WHEN I HEARD AND SAW A HIGE BRIGHT LIGHT HOVER OVER MYU HOUSE. I RAN OUT TO SEE WHAT IT WAS AND IT JUS SHOT OFF HIGH INTO THE CLOUDS. IT WAS VERY BRIGHT AND WHOULD CHANGE COLOR. IT HOVERED IN PLACE FOR ABOUT 5 MINUTES AND THEN STATED GOING UP AND SOWN SIDE TO SIDE ALL IN ONE PLACE. NO AIRCRAFT IM AWARE CAN DO WHAT MY EYES WITNESSED LAST NIGHT. IT WAS CHANGING DIRECTIONS AND GOING UP AND DOWN WITH AN OBLITERATING SPEED. I RAN INSIDE MY HOUSE AND RECORDED SOME OF THE ACTION. I HAVE A MINUTE OF FOOTAGE
Summary: BRIGHT LITE HOVERING IN SPINNIN MOTION
